TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TabItemState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a tab item that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The TabItemState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the following classes:
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TabItem>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TabItemLeftEdge>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TabItemRightEdge>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItem>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItemLeftEdge>
- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItemRightEdge>
The TabItemState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState Disabled = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState Hot = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState Normal = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState Selected = int32(3)
